title: Microsoft Windows 3.1 (ISO Version)
description:
Made by Keks (a.k.a. LDTVProductions)

This is a non-bootable ISO image created by
extracting the contents of all Windows 3.1
floppy images and placing them in one folder.
Use this on a DOS Virutal Machine (with CD-ROM
drivers installed) on Virtual PC (VirtualBox and
vmWare not recommended because compactibility 
with graphics and mouse issues). For all the
seeders, my personal thanks - i really love 
bringing old stuff form the dust.
				-Keks
				 14. August 2013.
